scripts.postinstall: npm run build-client && npm run build-admin && npm run server
scripts.start-all: npm run server & npm run client & npm run admin
scripts.front: npm run client & npm run admin
scripts.build-server: cd server && cp -r dist ../production && cp -r package.json ../production && cd ../production && npm install
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm i && npm run build  && cp -r build ../production/public
scripts.build-admin: cd admin && npm i && npm run build && cp -r build ../production/admin
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-admin
